website_summaries.verdict: Don't let the 64-bit processor fool you—the Android-based HTC Desire 510 on Boost Mobile under-delivers on most other fronts.

customer_reviews.title: this phone will not register to any carer

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible product. I take responsibility for ordering it without ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. I take responsibility for ordering it without doing appropriate research. The camera is horrible, no flash. It takes grainy pics. Unable to download aps because of extremely limited storage capacity. Forced to delete numerous photos for the same reason. I would never recommend this phone. Please don't waste your money and time on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone but lags at time!!!!! Download Memory Booster!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I am still using this phone it is very responsive and fast. Can be slow at times but rarely will.the spacE issue can become unstable but you should download memory booster first and I guarantee this will be a product to remember.

I wish I could rate this with zero stars!

customer_reviews.title: The Phone is Okay I Guess >_<

If you are a person who needs a phone with storage, this is not the phone for you. Running with only 4gbs of storage, you won't be able to save or hold anything on it. Though the phone didn't have enough storage or flash for the camera, the cheap phone still held well like any other HTC I've had in the past.

product_meta.title: HTC Desire 510 (A11) White (Boost Mobile)
product_meta.description: Stay up-to-date on all your favorite content with quick dl's and live streams. The powerful quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 400 processor allows you to launch multimedia fast. Give your content the quality experience it deserves. It's never been easier to view photos and videos with ease on the generous 4.7-inch display. The best part is this trusted device still fits perfectly in the palm of your hand. HTC BlinkFeed has been enhanced to tailor content specifically for you. Personalize your own stream of content in seconds, and be the first to know with timely updates at a glance. HTC Dot View lets you stand out from the crowd with a new take on a retro look in a full-cover, interactive phone case. See who's calling, then answer or decline the call without opening it. Power button commands conveniently allow you to turn the screen on and off and dismiss alerts. *SIM Card not included
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars572 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
